hooks.prompt:
PROTOCOL REMINDER - FMOD Importer Project:

User request received. Before responding:

1. IDENTIFY TASK TYPE:
   - Bug/Error → Apply fmod-debug workflow
   - New feature → Apply fmod-feature workflow
   - Refactor/Quality → Apply fmod-refactor workflow
   - Review request → Apply fmod-review workflow

2. AFTER ANY CODE MODIFICATION, CHECK:
   - Line counts: CRITICAL >1000, RECOMMEND >900, SUGGEST >800, INFO >750
   - Code duplication: Flag if 3+ occurrences
   - SOLID violations: Especially Single Responsibility
   - Documentation: Update docstrings, README, CHANGELOG

3. CRITICAL FILES (check if modified):
   - project.py: 1075 lines (CRITICAL - cache disabled)
   - widgets.py: 724 lines (90% threshold)
   - naming.py: 710 lines (89% threshold)

4. PRINCIPLES:
   - SOLID, DRY (extract at 3rd occurrence), KISS, SSOT
   - 800-line modularity threshold
   - English-only code/comments
   - Conventional commits (type(scope): subject)

Return 'PROTOCOL_ACKNOWLEDGED' to proceed.
